ygData.subject: Re: Biographies
ygData.msgSnippet: My main character is a warrior, second is a bard, so I won t tell you what mine says :)
ygData.messageBody:
My main character is a warrior, second is a bard, so I won't tell you what
mine says :)

> ----------
> From: Roop Dirump[SMTP:roop@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 2:13 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Biographies
>
> From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>
>
> We are bards, and so I thought we'd all have, of course, the most creative
> bios people can read when they click us. Since most of us will never meet
> each other in real life (er wait a second) or Everquest, I was wondering
> what everyone's Bios say? Might be interesting. I'll start us off with
> my
> bio, which reads: dddd;
>
> Roop
